javadoc:
NOTE:  ALL LanguageProvider CLASSES MUST END IN "LanguageProvider".  If not,
 the ClassSearcher will not find them.
 
 Service for providing languages.

methods.name: getLanguage
methods.comment: Returns the language with the given name or null if no language has that name

params.name: languageId
params.comment: the name of the language to be retrieved

return.comment: the Language with the given name

methods.javadoc: Returns a list of language descriptions provided by this provider
methods.name: getLanguageDescriptions
methods.comment: Returns a list of language descriptions provided by this provider

methods.javadoc:
@return true if one of more languages or language description failed to load
 properly.
methods.name: hadLoadFailure

return.comment:
true if one of more languages or language description failed to load
 properly.

methods.name: isLanguageLoaded
methods.comment: Returns true if the given language has been successfully loaded

params.name: languageId
params.comment: the name of the language to be retrieved

return.comment: true if the given language has been successfully loaded

name: LanguageProvider
comment:
